name: Wishbind
storyline: A mysterious person has summoned you to a new world to ask you for help in finding a special kind of leaves. Lose yourself in this new world while you discover the secrets of the leaves and the story of the world through the local population and environmental storytelling.
summary: A 2D platformer collect-a-thon in which you'll have to help someone collect a special kind of leaves to help them fulfill their project, while meeting interesting characters, overcoming tough platforming challenges and discovering secrets all throughout the world.
